sections.heading: agreement; wind agreement; manner granted
sections.text: Any property owner may grant a solar agreement or wind agreement in the same manner and with the same effect as a conveyance of any other interest in real property.SourceLaws 1979, LB 353, § 10;Laws 1997, LB 140, § 6;Laws 2012, LB828, § 6.

66-910.Solar agreement; wind agreement; manner granted.

Any property owner may grant a solar agreement or wind agreement in the same manner and with the same effect as a conveyance of any other interest in real property.

SourceLaws 1979, LB 353, § 10;Laws 1997, LB 140, § 6;Laws 2012, LB828, § 6.
